## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-950">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-950">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-951">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-952">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-952">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="05a65-953">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-953">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-954">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-955">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-955">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="05a65-956">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-956">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-957">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-958">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-958">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-959">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-959">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-960">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-960">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-961">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-961">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-962">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-962">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-963">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-964">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-965">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-966">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-967">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-968">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-968">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-969">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-969">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-984">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-984">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-985">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-986">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-986">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-987">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-987">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-988">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-988">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-989">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-989">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-990">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-990">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-991">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-991">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-992">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-992">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-993">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-993">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-994">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-994">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-995">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-996">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-997">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-998">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-998">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-999">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-999">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1013">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1013">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1014">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1014">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1015">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1016">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1016">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1017">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1017">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1018">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1018">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1022">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1023">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1023">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1024">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1024">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1039">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1039">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1040">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1041">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1041">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1042">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1042">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1043">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1043">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1044">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1044">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1045">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1045">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1046">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1046">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1047">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1047">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1048">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1048">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1049">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1049">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1050">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1050">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1051">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1051">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1052">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1052">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1053">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1053">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1054">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1055">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1055">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1056">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1058">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1058">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1059">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1059">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1060">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1060">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1066"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1066">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1067">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1067">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1078"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1078">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1079">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1080">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1080">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1081">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1081">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1082">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1082">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1083">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1083">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1084">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1084">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1085">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1086">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1086">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1087">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1088">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1088">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1089">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1089">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1090">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1090">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1091">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1091">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1093">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1093">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1095">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1095">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1096">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1097">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1097">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1098">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1099">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1099">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1100">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1100">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1101">找到或中的关键字 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1101">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1234">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1234">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1236">11位数加上可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1236">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1237">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1238">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1238">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1239">6个数字和两个可选句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1239">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1240">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1240">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1241">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1241">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1242">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1242">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1243">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1243">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1244">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1245">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1246">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1247">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1248">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1248">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1249">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1249">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1250">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1250">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1251">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1251">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1252">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1252">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1253">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1253">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1312">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1312">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1313">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1313">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1314">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1315">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1315">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1316">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1317">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1317">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1318">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1319">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1319">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1320">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1321">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1322">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1322">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1323">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1323">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1347">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1347">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1348">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1348">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1350">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1350">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1352">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1352">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1354">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1354">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1357">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1357">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1358">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1358">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1359">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1359">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1360">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1360">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1380">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1380">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1381">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1382">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1383">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1384">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1385">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1386">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1388">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1388">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1390">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1390">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1391">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1391">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1392">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1392">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1393">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1393">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1394">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1394">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1395">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1395">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1396">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1396">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1397">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1397">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1398">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1398">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1399">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1400">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1400">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1401">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1402">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1403">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1403">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1404">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1404">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1406">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1406">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1407">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1408">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1409">n º tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1409">nº tva</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1411">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1411">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1412">numéro。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1412">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1413">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1414">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1418">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1418">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1419">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1420">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1420">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1421">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1422">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1422">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1423">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1423">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1424">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1424">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1425">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1425">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1426">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1426">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1427">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1427">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1428">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1428">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1429">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1429">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1430">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1430">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1431">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1431">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1433">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1436">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1436">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1437">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1437">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1438">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1439">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1439">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1440">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1440">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1441">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1447">营业</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1447">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1448">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1448">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1453">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1453">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1455">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1455">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1457">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1457">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1458">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1458">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1459">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1459">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1460">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1460">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1461">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1461">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1462">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1462">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1463">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1463">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1464">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1464">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1465">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1465">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1466">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1466">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1467">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1468">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1468">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1469">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1470">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1470">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1471">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1471">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1472">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1472">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1473">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1473">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1475">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1475">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1476">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1476">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1498">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1498">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1500">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1500">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1501">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1501">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1502">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1503">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1503">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1504">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1504">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1505">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1505">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1506">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1507">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1507">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1508">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1509">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1509">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1510">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1510">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1511">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1511">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1512">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1512">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1513">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1513">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1514">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1514">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1515">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1516">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1517">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1518">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1519">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1519">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1520">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1520">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1521">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1523">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1523">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1524">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1530">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1530">número de rregistro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1534">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1534">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1535">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1535">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1536">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1538">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1538">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1539">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1540">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1540">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1541">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1542">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1543">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1545">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1545">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1546">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1546">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1673">保加利亚统一民事号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1673">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1674">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1674">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1675">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1675">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1676">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1676">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1677">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1677">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1678">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1678">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1679">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1679">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1680">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1681">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1681">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1682">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1683">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1683">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1684">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1684">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1685">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1685">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1686">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1686">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1687">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1687">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1689">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1691">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1692">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1692">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1693">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1693">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1694">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1694">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1695">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1695">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1696">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1696">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1740">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1740">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1741">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1741">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1742">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1743">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1743">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1744">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1745">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1745">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1746">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1747">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1748">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1749">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1750">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1750">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1751">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1751">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1768">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1768">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1769">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1769">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1770">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1770">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1771">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1771">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1772">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1772">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1773">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1773">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1774">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1774">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1775">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1775">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1776">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1776">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1777">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1777">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1778">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1778">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1779">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1780">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1780">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1781">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1782">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1783">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1783">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1784">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1784">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1785">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1785">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1786">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1787">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1787">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1788">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1788">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1812">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1812">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1813">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1814">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1814">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1815">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1815">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1816">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1816">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1817">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1818">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1819">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1820">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1821">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1821">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1822">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1822">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1823">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1823">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1959">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1959">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1960">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1961">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1961">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1962">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1963">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1963">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1964">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1965">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1966">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1967">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1967">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1968">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1968">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1969">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1969">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1981">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1981">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1983">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1983">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1984">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1985">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1985">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1987">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1987">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-1988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-1989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1990">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1990">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-1991">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-1991">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2021">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2021">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2022">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2023">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2023">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2024">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2025">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2025">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2026">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2027">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2028">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2029">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2030">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2030">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2031">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2031">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
