## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2064">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2064">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2066">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2066">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2067">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2068">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2068">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2069">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2069">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2070">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2070">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2071">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2071">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2072">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2072">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2073">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2073">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2074">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2074">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2075">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2076">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2076">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2077">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2078">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2079">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2079">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2080">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2080">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2081">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2081">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2082">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2082">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2083">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2083">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2084">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2084">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2085">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2086">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2086">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2087">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2087">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2088">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2088">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2094">罪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2094">sins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2095">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2095">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2096">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2096">ssns</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2097">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2097">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2098">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2098">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2099">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2099">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2100">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2100">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2101">sin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2101">sin#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2102">soc ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2102">soc ins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2103">social ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2103">social ins</span></span> 

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2104">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2104">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2105">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2105">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2106">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2106">drivers license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2107">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2107">driver's licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2108">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2108">drivers licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2109">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2109">DOB</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2113">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2113">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2115">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2115">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2117">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2117">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2118">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2118">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2119">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2119">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2120">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2120">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2121">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2121">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2122">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2122">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2123">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2123">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2124">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2124">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2125">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2126">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2126">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2127">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2129">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2129">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2130">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2130">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2131">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2132">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2132">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2133">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2133">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2134">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2135">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2135">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2136">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2136">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2137">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2137">National Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2139">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2139">ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2140">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2140">Identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2144">墨守成规</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2144">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2145">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2145">Cédula de Identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2148">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2148">Identificación</span></span> 

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2149">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2149">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2151">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2151">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2153">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2153">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2154">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2154">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2155">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2155">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2156">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2156">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2157">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2157">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2159">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2161">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2162">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2162">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2163">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2163">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2164">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2166">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2166">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2180">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2180">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2182">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2182">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2184">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2184">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2186">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2186">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2189">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2189">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2190">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2190">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2191">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2191">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2192">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2192">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2193">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2193">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2194">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2194">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2195">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2196">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2196">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2197">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2197">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2457">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2457">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2458">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2459">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2460">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2460">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2461">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2462">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2462">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2464">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2467">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2467">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2468">找到或中的关键字 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2468">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2592">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2592">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2593">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2593">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2595">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2595">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2596">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2597">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2597">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2598">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2599">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2599">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2600">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2601">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2602">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2602">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2603">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2603">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2634">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2634">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2635">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2636">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2637">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2637">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2638">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2639">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2639">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2640">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2641">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2641">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2642">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2643">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2644">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2644">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2645">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2645">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2663">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2663">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2665">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2665">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2667">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2667">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2668">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2668">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2669">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2669">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2674">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2674">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2675">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2675">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2676">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2678">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2678">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2679">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2710">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2710">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2711">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2713">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2713">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2715">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2715">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2716">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2716">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2717">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2717">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2718">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2719">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2720">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2721">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2722">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2722">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2723">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2723">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2724">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2724">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2725">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2725">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2742">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2742">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2743">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2745">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2745">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2747">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2747">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2751">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2751">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2752">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2752">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2753">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2878">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2878">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2879">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2880">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2881">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2882">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2883">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2884">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2885">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2886">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2886">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2887">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2888">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2888">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2890">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2890">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2893">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2893">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2894">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2894">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2903">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2903">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2904">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2905">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2906">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2906">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2908">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2908">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2910">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2913">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2913">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2914">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2940">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2940">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2941">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2941">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2942">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2942">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2943">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2943">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2944">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2944">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2945">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2945">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2946">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2946">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2947">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2948">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2948">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2949">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2950">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2950">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2951">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2951">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2952">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2952">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2953">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2953">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2955">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2955">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2957">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2957">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2958">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2958">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2959">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2959">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2960">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2961">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2961">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2989">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2989">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2990">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2990">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2992">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2992">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2993">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-2994">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2994">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2995">字母 "E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2995">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2996">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2996">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2997">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2997">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-2998">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2998">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-2999">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-2999">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3000">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3000">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3001">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3001">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3002">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3002">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3003">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3003">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3004">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3004">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3130">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3130">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3131">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3133">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3133">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3135">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3135">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3137">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3137">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3140">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3140">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3141">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3141">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3160">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3160">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3161">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3162">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3162">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3163">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3164"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3164">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3165">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3165">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3166">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3166">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3167">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3167">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3168">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3168">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3169">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3169">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3170">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3170">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3171">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3171">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3176">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3176">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3177">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3177">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3178">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3178">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3179">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3180">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3180">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3181">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3228">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3228">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3229">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3230">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3231">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3231">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3232">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3233">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3233">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3234">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3234">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3235">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3235">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3236">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3236">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3237">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3237">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3238">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3238">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3239">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3239">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3240">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3240">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3241">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3241">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3242">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3242">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3243">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3243">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3244">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3244">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3245">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3245">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3261">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3261">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3262">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3264">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3264">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3266">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3266">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3268">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3268">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3270">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3271">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3271">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3272">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3272">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3396">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3396">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3397">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3399">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3399">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3401">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3401">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3402">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3403">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3403">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3404">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3406">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3406">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3407">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3407">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3424">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3424">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3426">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3426">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3428">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3428">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3429">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3429">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3430">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3430">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3431">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3431">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3433">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3435">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3436">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3436">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3437">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3437">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3438">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3438">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3439">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3439">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3440">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3440">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3441">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3441">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3513">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3513">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3514">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3514">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3516">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3516">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3518">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3518">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3519">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3519">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3520">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3520">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3521">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3521">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3523">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3523">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3525">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3525">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3526">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3526">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3527">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3527">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3528">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3529">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3529">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3531">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3534">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3534">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3535">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3535">nationalnumber#</span></span>
