## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3543">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3543">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3544">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3544">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3545">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3545">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3546">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3546">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3547">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3547">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3548">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3548">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3549">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3549">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3550">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3550">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3555">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3555">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3556">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3556">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3557">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3557">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3558">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3558">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3559">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3559">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3560">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3560">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3562">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3562">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3564">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3564">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3565">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3565">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3566">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3566">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3567">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3567">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3568">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3568">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3569">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3569">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3570">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3570">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3571">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3571">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3572">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3572">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3573">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3573">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3574">Keywords_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3574">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3575">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3575">driverlic</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3699">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3699">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3700">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3700">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3705">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3706">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3706">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3707">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3708">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3708">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3709">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3709">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3710">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3710">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3711">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3711">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3712">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3712">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3714">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3714">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3716">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3717">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3717">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3718">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3718">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3719">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3720">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3720">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3753">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3753">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3754">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3754">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3756">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3756">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3758">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3758">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3759">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3760">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3760">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3761">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3763">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3763">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3764">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3764">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3778">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document 无 dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3778">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3779">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3779">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3781">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3781">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3783">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3783">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3784">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3785">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-3786">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-3787">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3788">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3788">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3789">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3789">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3790">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3790">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3791">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3791">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3792">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3792">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3793">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3793">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3794">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3794">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-3795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-3795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4241">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4241">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4242">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4242">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4243">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4244">10个数字和包含连字符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4244">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4245">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4246">10个数字和包含连字符的字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4246">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4247">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4247">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4248">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4248">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4249">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4249">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4250">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4250">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4251">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4252">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4252">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4253">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4254">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4254">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4255">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4255">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4256">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4387">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4387">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4388">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4388">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4389">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4389">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4390">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4390">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4391">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4391">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4392">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4392">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4393">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4393">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4394">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4394">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4395">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4395">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4396">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4396">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4397">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4397">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4398">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4398">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4399">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4399">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4400">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4400">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4401">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4401">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4402">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4402">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4403">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4403">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4404">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4405">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4405">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4406">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4406">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4424">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4424">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4426">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4426">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4428">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4428">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4429">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4429">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4430">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4430">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4431">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4431">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4432">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4432">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4433">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4434">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4435">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4436">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4436">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4437">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4438">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4438">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4439">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4439">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4440">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4440">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4441">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4441">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4442">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4442">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4491">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4491">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4492">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4492">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4493">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4494">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4494">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4495">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4495">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4496">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4496">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4497">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4497">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4498">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4498">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4499">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4500">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4500">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4501">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4502">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4503">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4503">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4504">找到 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 或 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4504">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4518">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4518">suomalainen passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4525">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4525">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4526">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4528">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4528">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4530">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4530">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4531">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4531">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4532">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4532">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4533">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4533">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4534">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4534">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4535">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4535">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4536">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4536">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4537">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4537">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4538">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4539">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4539">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4540">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4541">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4542">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4542">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4543">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4543">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4545">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4545">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4546">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4547">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4547">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4548">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4548">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4569">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4569">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4570">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4570">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4571">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4572">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4572">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4573">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4574">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4574">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4575">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4576">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4576">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4577">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4578">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4578">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4579">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4579">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4580">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4580">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4707">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4707">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4708">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4708">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4709">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4709">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4710">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4710">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4711">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4711">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4712">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4712">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4713">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4713">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4714">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4715">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4715">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4716">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4717">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4717">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4718">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4718">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4719">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4719">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4720">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4720">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4721">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4721">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4722">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4722">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4724">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4727">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4727">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4728">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4728">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4729">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4729">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4730">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4730">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4731">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4731">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4732">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4732">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4733">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4733">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4734">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4734">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4735">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4736">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4736">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4738">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4738">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4739">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4740">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4741">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4743">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4743">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4744">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4744">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4745">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4745">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4749">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4749">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4750">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4750">cni#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4753">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4753">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4754">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4754">national identity</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4758">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4758">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4759">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4759">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4760">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4761">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4761">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4762">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4762">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4763">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4763">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4764">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4764">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4765">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4765">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4766">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4766">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4771">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4771">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4772">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4772">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4791">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4791">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4792">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4792">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4793">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4793">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4794">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4794">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4796">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4796">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4797">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4798">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4798">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4799">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4799">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4800">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4800">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4801">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4801">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4802">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4803">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4804">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4805">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4805">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4806">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4806">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4807">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4807">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4808">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4809">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4810">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4810">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4811">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4811">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4812">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4838">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4838">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4840">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4840">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4841">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4842">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4842">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4843">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4843">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4844">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4844">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4845">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4845">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4846">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4846">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4847">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4847">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4848">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4848">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4849">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4849">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4850">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4850">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4851">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4851">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4852">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4852">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4853">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4854">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4854">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4855">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4856">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4856">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4857">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4857">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4858">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4858">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4859">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4859">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4860">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4860">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4867">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4867">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4870">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4870">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4871">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4871">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4880">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4880">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4881">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4881">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4882">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4882">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4883">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4883">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4884">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4884">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4885">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4885">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4886">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4886">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4887">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4888">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4889">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4890">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4890">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4891">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4891">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4892">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4892">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4893">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4893">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4894">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4895">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4896">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4897">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4897">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4898">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4898">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4899">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4899">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4900">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4901">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4901">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4902">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4903">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4904">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4904">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4905">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4905">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4906">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4906">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4907">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4907">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4910">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4910">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4920">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4920">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4921">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4921">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4923">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4923">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4925">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4925">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4926">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4926">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4927">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4927">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4928">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4928">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4929">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4929">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4930">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4930">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4932">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4932">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-4933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-4934">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4935">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4935">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4936">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4936">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-4937">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-4937">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5086">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5086">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5087">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5088">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5088">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5089">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5089">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5090">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5091">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5091">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5092">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5092">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5093">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5093">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5094">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5094">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5095">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5095">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5096">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5096">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5097">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5097">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5098">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5098">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5099">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5099">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5100">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5100">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5101">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5101">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5102">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5102">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5103">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5103">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5104">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5104">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5105">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5105">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5106">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5106">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5107">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5107">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5108">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5108">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5109">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5109">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5110">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5110">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5111">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5111">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5112">个人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5112">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5113">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5113">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5114">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5114">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5115">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5115">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5116">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5116">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5117">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5117">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5118">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5118">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5119">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5119">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5120">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5120">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5121">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5121">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5122">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5122">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5123">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5123">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5124">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5124">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5125">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5125">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5126">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5126">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5127">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5128">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5129">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5131">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5131">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5132">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5132">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5133">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5134">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5135">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5135">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5136">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5136">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5137">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
