## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5149">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5149">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5151">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5151">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5153">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5153">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5154">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5155">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5155">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5156">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5157">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5157">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5158">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5158">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5159">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5159">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5160">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5160">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5161">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5161">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5162">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5163">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5163">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5164">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5165">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5166">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5166">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5167">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5167">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5168">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5168">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5169">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5169">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5195">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5195">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5196">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5196">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5197">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5197">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5198">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5198">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5199">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5199">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5200">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5200">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5201">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5201">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5203">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5203">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5205">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5205">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5206">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5206">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5207">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5207">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5208">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5208">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5209">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5210">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5210">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5211">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5212">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5212">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5213">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5218">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5218">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5219">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5219">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5220">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5220">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5221">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5221">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5222">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5222">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5223">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5223">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5224">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5224">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5225">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5225">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5226">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5226">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5227">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5227">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5228">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5228">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5229">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5229">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5230">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5230">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5231">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5231">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5232">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5232">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5234">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5234">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5236">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5236">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5238">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5241">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5241">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5242">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5242">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5368">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5368">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5370">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5370">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5372">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5372">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5373">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5373">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5374">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5374">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5375">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5375">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5376">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5376">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5377">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5377">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5378">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5378">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5379">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5379">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5381">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5383">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5383">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5384">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5384">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5385">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5385">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5386">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5386">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5387">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5387">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5393">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5393">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5398">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5398">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5399">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5399">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5400">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5401">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5401">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5402">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5403">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5403">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5404">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5404">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5405">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5405">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5406">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5406">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5407">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5407">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5408">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5408">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5409">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5409">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5424">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5424">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5425">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5425">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5426">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5426">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5427">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5427">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5428">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5428">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5429">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5429">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5430">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5430">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5431">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5431">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5432">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5432">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5433">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5434">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5434">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5435">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5436">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5436">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5437">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5437">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5438">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5438">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5439">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5439">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5440">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5440">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5441">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5441">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5442">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5442">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5471">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5471">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5473">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5473">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5475">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5475">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5476">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5476">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5477">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5477">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5478">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5478">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5480">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5483">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5483">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5484">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5484">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5485">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5486">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5486">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5487">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5487">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5488">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5528">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5528">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5529">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5531">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5531">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5533">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5533">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5534">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5534">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5535">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5535">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5536">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5537">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5538">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5539">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5540">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5541">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5666">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5666">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5667">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5668">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5669">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5670">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5671">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5672">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5673">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5674">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5674">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5675">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5676">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5676">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5677">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5677">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5678">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5678">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5679">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5679">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5680">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5680">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5681">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5682">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5682">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5683">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5684">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5684">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5685">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5685">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5686">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5686">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5687">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5687">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5688">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5688">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5693">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5693">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5694">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5694">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5695">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5695"> ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5699">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5699">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5700">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5701">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5702">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5702">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5703">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5704">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5704">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5705">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5706">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5707">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5709">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5710">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5727">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5727">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5728">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5728">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5729">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5729">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5730">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5730">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5731">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5732">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5732">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5733">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5734">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5734">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5735">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5736">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5736">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5737">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5737">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5738">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5738">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5739">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5740">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5740">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5760">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5760">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5761">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5761">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5762">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5762">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5763">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5763">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5764">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5764">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5765">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5765">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5766">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5766">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5767">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5768">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5768">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5769">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5770">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5770">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5771">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5771">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5772">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5772">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5773">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5773">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5774">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5775">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5775">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5776">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5777">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5777">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5778">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5778">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5779">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5779">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5780">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5781">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5781">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
