## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5807">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5807">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5808">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5808">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5809">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5809">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5810">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5810">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5811">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5811">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5812">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5812">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5813">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5813">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5814">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5815">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5815">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5817">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5817">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5818">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5818">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5819">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5819">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5820">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5820">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5821">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5822">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5823">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5824">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5825">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5825">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5826">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5826">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5827">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5827">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5828">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5828">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5829">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5830">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5830">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5831">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5831">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5832">增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5832">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5833">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5833">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5834">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5834">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5835">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5835">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5836">纳税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5836">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5837">增值税áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5837">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5838">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5838">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5839">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5839">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5840">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5840">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5841">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5841">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5842"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5842">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5844">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5844">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5845">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5845">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5846">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5846">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5847">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5847">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5848">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5848">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5849">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5849">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5851">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5854">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5854">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5855">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5855">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5856">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5856">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5857">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5857">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5858">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5858">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5859">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5859">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5860">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5860">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5861">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5861">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5863">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5863">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5865">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5865">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5866">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5866">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5867">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5867">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5868">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5868">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5869">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5869">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5870">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5870">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5871">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5872">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5872">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5873">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5874">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5875">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5875">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5876">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5876">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5877">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5877">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5878">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5878">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5879">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5879">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5880">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5881">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5881">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5882">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5882">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5883">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5883">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5884">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5884">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5885">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5885">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5886">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5886">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5887">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5887">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5889">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5889">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5890">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5891">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5891">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5892">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5892">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5893">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5893">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5894">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5894">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5895">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5895">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5896">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5896">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5897">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5897">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5898">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5898">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5899">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5899">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5900">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5901">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5901">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5902">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5903">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5903">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5904">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5904">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5905">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5905">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5906">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5906">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5907">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5907">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5908">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5908">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5909">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5909">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5910">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5910">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5911"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5911">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5912">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5912">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5913">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5913">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5914">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5914">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5915">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5915">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5916">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5916">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5917">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5917">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5918">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5918">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5919">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5919">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5922">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5922">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5923">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5924">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5924">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5925">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5926">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5926">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5927">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5927">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5928">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5928">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5929">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5929">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5930">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5930">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5931">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5931">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5932">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5933">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5933">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5935">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5935">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5937">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5940">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5940">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5941">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5941">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5943">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5943">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5944">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5944">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5945">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5945">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5946">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5946">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5947">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5947">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5948">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5948">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5949">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5949">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5950">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5951">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5951">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5952">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5953">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5953">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5955">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5957">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5957">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5958">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5958">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5959">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5959">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5960">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5961">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5962">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5962">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5963">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5963">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5964">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5964">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5965">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5965">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5966">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5966">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5967">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5967">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5968">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5969">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5969">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5970">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5970">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5971">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5971">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5972"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5972">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5973">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5977">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5977">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5978">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5978">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5979">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5979">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5980">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5980">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5981">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5981">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5982">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5982">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5983">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5983">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5984">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5984">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5985">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5985">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5986">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5986">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5987">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5987">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5988">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5988">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5989">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5989">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5990">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5990">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5991">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5991">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5992">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5992">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5993">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5993">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5994">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5994">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5995">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5996">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5996">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-5997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-5998">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5998">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-5999">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-5999">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6000">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6000">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6001">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6002">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6002">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6003">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6004">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6004">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6005">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6005">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6006">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6006">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6130">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6130">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6131">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6133">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6133">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6135">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6135">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6136">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6136">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6137">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6137">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6138">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6139">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6139">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6140">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6141">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6141">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6142">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6142">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6143">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6164">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6164">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6166">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6166">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6167">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6167">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6168">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6168">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6169">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6169">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6171">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6171">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6172">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6172">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6173">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6173">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6174">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6174">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6175">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6175">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6176">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6176">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6177">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6177">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6178">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6179">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6180">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6181">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6182">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6182">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6183">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6183">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6184">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6185">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6185">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6186">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6186">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6187">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6232">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6232">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6233">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6234">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6234">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6235">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6236">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6236">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6237">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6238">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6238">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6239">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6240">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6240">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6241">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6241">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6242">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6242">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6243">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6243">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6244">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6245">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6245">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6246">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6247">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6248">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6248">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6249">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6249">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6250">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6250">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6256">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6256">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6258">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6258">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6259">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6260">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6260">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6264">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6265">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6265">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6266">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6266">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6267">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6267">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6268">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6268">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6269">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6269">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6270">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6270">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6271">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6271">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6272">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6272">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6273">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6273">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6274">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6275">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6275">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6276">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6277">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6277">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6278">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6278">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6279">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6279">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6280">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6280">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6281">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6281">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6285">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6286">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6286">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6287">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6287">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6288">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6289">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6289">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6290">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6290">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6291">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6291">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6292">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6292">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6293">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6293">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6294">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6294">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6295">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6295">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6296">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6297">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6298">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6299">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6300">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6301">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6303">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6303">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6305">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6305">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6306">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6306">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6307">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6307">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6308">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6308">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6309">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6309">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6310">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6310">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6311">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6311">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6312">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6312">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6313">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6314">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6314">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6315">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6316">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6316">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6317">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6317">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6318">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6318">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6319">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6319">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6320">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6320">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6321">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6321">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6322">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6322">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6323">codice 会计</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6323">codice fiscal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6325">codice id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6325">codice id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6326">codice personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6326">codice personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6327">会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6327">fiscal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6328">numero certificato personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6328">numero certificato personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6329">numero di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6329">numero di identificazione fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6330">numero id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6330">numero id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6331">numero personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6331">numero personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6332">个人证书号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6332">personal certificate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6333">个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6333">personal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6334">个人 id 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6334">personal id code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6335">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6335">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6336">personalcodeno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6336">personalcodeno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6337">税码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6337">tax code</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6338">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6355">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6355">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6356">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6356">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6357">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6358">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6358">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6360">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6360">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6361">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6361">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6362">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6362">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6364">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6364">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6367">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6367">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6368">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6368">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6389">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6389">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6390">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6390">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6391">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6391">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6392">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6392">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6393">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6393">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6394">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6394">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6395">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6395">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6396">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6396">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6397">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6397">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6398">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6398">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6399">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6399">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6400">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6400">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6401">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6401">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6402">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6402">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6403">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6403">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6404">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6404">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6405">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6405">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6406">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6406">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6407">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6407">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6408">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6408">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6409">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6409">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6410">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6410">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6411">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6411">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6413">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6413">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6419">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6419">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6420">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6421">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6421">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6422">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6423">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6423">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6424">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6424">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6425">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6425">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6426">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6426">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6427">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6427">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6428">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6428">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6430">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6432">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6433">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6433">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6434">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6434">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6435">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6435">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6436">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6436">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6437">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6437">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6438">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6439">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6439">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6440">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6440">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6441">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6441">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6442">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6442">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6443">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6443">Checking Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6444">Checking Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6444">Checking Account</span></span>
