## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6487">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6487">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6489">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6489">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6490">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6491">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6491">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6492">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6493">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6493">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6494">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6495">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6496">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6496">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6497">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6497">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6535">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6535">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6536">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6536">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6537">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6537">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6538">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6538">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6539">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6539">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6540">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6540">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6541">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6543">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6543">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6545">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6545">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6546">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6546">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6547">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6547">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6548">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6549">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6549">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6550">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6551">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6552">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6552">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6553">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6553">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6555">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6556">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6557">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6557">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6558">公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6558">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6559">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6559">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6560">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6560">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6561">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6561">マイナンバーカード</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6568">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6568">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6569">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6570">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6571">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6572">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6573">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6574">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6575">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6576">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6576">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6577">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6578">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6578">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6579">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6579">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6580">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6580">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6581">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6581">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6582">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6582">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6583">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6583">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6585">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6585">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6587">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6587">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6588">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6588">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6589">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6589">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6590">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6590">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6591">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6591">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6596">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6596">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6597">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6597">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6598">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6598">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6599">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6599">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6600">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6600">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6601">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6601">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6602">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6602">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6603">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6603">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6604">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6604">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6605">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6605">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6606">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6606">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6607">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6607">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6608">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6608">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6609">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6609">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6610">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6610">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6611">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6611">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6612">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6612">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6613">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6613">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6614">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6631">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6631">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6632">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6633">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6633">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6634">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6635">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6635">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6636">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6636">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6637">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6637">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6638">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6638">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6639">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6640">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6640">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6641">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6642">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6643">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6643">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6644">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6644">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6645">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6645">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6646">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6646">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6647">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6647">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6648">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6648">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6649">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6649">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6650">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6650">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6651">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6651">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6652">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6652">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6653">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6653">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6655">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6655">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6657">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6657">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6661">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6662">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6662">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6663">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6663">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6664">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6664">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6665">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6665">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6666">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6666">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6667">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6667">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6668">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6668">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6669">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6669">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6670">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6670">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6671">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6671">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6676">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6676">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6677">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6678">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6678">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6679">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6680">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6680">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6681">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6681">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6682">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6682">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6683">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6683">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6684">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6684">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6686">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6688">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6688">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6689">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6689">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6690">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6692">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6692">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6693">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6693">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6714">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6714">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6715">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6717">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6717">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6719">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6719">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6720">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6720">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6721">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6721">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6723">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6726">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6726">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6727">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6852">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6852">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6853">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6853">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6854">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6854">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6855">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6855">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6856">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6856">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6857">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6857">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6858">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6858">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6859">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6859">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6860">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6860">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6861">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6861">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6862">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6862">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6863">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6863">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6864">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6864">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6865">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6865">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6870">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6870">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6871">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6872">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6873">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6873">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6936">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6936">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6937">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6937">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6939">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6939">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6941">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6941">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6942">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6942">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6943">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6943">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6947">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6948">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6948">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6949">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6969">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6969">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6970">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6970">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6972">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6972">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6974">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6974">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6975">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6976">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6976">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-6977">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-6978">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6979">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6979">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-6980">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-6980">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7105">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7105">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7106">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7106">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7107">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7107">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7108">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7108">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7109">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7109">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7110">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7110">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7111">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7111">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7113">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7113">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7114">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7115">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7115">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7116">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7116">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7117">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7117">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7118">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7118">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7119">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7119">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7120">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7120">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7121">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7121">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7122">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7122">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7123">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7123">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7124">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7124">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7125">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7125">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7126">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7126">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7127">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7127">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7162">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7162">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7163">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7163">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7164">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7165">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7165">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7166">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7167">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7167">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7168">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7169">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7169">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7170">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7171">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7172">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7172">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7173">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7190">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7190">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7191">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7192">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7193">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7193">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7194">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7195">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7195">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7196">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7197">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7197">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7198">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7199">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7200">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7200">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7201">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7201">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7325">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7325">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7326">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7326">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7327">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7327">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7328">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7328">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7329">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7329">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7330">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7330">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7331">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7331">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7333">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7333">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7334">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7335">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7335">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7336">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7336">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7337">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7337">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7338">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7339">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7339">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7340">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7341">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7341">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7342">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7342">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7343">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7343">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7344">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7345">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7345">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7368">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7368">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7369">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7369">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7370">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7371">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7371">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7372">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7373">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7373">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7375">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7375">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7377">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7378">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7378">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7379">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7379">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7380">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7380">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7381">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7381">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7382">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7382">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7383">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7383">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7384">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7384">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7385">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7385">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7386">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7386">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7388">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7388">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7390">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7390">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7391">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7391">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7392">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7392">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7393">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7393">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7394">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7394">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7395">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7395">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7396">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7396">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7397">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7397">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7398">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7398">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7399">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7400">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7400">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7401">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7402">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7403">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7403">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7404">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7404">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7406">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7406">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7446">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7446">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7448">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7448">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7450">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7450">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7451">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7451">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7452">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7452">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7453">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7453">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7454">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7454">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7455">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7455">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7456">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7456">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7458">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7460">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7461">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7461">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7462">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7462">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7463">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7463">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7464">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7464">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7465">数字应用程序卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7465">digital application card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7467">i/c 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7467">i/c no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7468">ic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7468">ic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7469">内部公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7469">ic no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7471">标识卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7471">identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7472">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7472">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7473">k/p</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7473">k/p</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7474">k/p no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7474">k/p no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7476">kad aplikasi 数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7476">kad aplikasi digital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7477">kad pengenalan 马来西亚</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7477">kad pengenalan malaysia</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7489">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7489">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7490">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7490">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7491">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7491">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7492">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7492">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7493">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7494">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7494">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7495">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7495">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7496">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7496">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7497">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7497">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7498">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7498">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7499">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7499">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7501">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7503">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7504">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7504">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7505">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7629">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7629">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7630">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7630">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7631">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7631">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7632">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7632">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7633">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7633">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7634">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7634">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7635">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7635">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7636">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7637">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7637">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7638">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7639">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7639">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7640">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7640">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7641">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7641">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7642">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7643">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7643">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7644">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7645">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7645">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7646">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7646">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7647">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7647">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7648">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7649">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7660">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7660">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7661">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7661">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7666">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7666">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7667">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7667">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7668">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7668">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7669">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7669">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7670">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7670">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7671">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7671">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7672">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7673">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7673">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7674">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7675">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7675">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7676">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7676">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7677">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7677">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
