## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7694">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7694">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7696">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7696">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7697">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7697">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7698">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7698">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7699">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7699">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7700">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7700">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7701">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7701">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7702">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7702">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7703">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7703">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7704">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7704">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7705">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7705">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7706">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7706">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7707">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7707">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7708">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7708">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7709">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7710">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7710">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7711">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7711">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7712">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7712">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7713">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7713">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7746">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7746">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7747">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7748">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7748">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7749">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7750">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7750">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7751">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7751">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7752">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7752">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7753">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7753">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7754">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7754">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7755">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7755">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7757">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7757">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7759">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7760">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7760">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7761">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7761">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7762">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7786">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7786">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7787">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7789">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7789">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7791">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7791">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7793">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7793">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7796">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7796">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7797">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7797">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7925">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7925">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7926">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7927">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7928">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7928">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7929">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7930">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7930">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7932">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7932">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7934">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7935">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7935">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7936">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7936">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7937">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7937">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7938">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7938">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7939">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7939">dutch passport number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7946">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7946">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7947">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7947">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7948">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7948">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7949">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7949">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7950">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7950">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7951">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7951">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7952">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7952">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7954">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7954">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7956">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7956">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7957">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7958">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7958">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-7959">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7960">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7960">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7961">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7961">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7962">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7962">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-7963">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7963">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-7964">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-7964">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8002">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8002">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8003">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8003">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8004">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8004">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8005">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8005">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8006">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8006">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8007">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8007">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8008">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8008">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8009">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8010">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8010">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8011">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8012">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8012">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8013">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8013">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8014">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8014">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8015">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8015">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8016">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8016">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8017">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8017">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8018">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8018">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8019">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8019">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8020">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8021">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8021">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8022">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8023">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8023">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8024">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8024">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8025">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8025">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8027">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8027">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8033">wearde tafoege 税 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8033">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8036">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8036">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8037">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8037">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8038">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8038">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8039">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8039">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8040">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8040">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8041">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8041">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8042">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8042">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8043">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8044">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8044">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8045">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8046">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8046">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8047">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8047">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8048">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8048">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8049">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8049">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8050">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8050">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8051">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8051">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8052">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8052">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8053">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8053">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8054">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8054">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8055">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8056">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8056">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8057">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8058">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8058">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8059">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8059">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8060">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8060">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8062">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8062">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8070">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8070">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8071">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8071">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8072">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8072">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8073">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8073">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8074">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8074">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8075">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8075">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8076">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8076">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8078">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8078">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8080">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8080">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8081">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8081">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8082">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8082">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8084">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8086">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8086">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8087">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8087">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8088">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8088">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8089">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8089">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8090">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8090">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8163">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8163">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8164">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8165">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8165">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8166">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8167">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8167">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8168">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8168">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8169">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8169">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8170">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8170">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8171">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8171">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8172">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8172">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8174">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8176">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8177">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8177">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8178">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8178">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8179">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8179">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8180">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8180">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8181">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8181">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8182">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8182">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8183">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8183">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8184">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8184">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8185">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8185">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8186">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8186">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8187">ird 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8187">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8188">inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8188">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8189">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8189">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8191">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8191">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8192">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8193">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8193">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8194">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8195">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8196">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8197">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8198">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8198">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8199">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8199">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8200">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8201">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8201">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8202">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8202">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8203">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8203">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8204">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8204">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8205">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8205">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8206">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8206">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8207">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8207">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8208">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8208">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8209">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8209">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8210">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8210">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8211">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8211">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8212">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8212">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8213">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8215">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8215">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8217">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8217">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8218">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8218">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8219">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8219">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8220">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8220">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8221">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8221">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8222">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8222">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8223">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8224">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8224">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8225">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8226">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8226">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8227">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8227">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8228">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8228">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8229">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8229">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8230">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8230">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8238">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8238">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8239">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8240">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8240">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8242">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8242">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8243">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8243">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8244">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8244">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8245">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8245">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8247">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8250">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8250">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8251">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8251">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8254">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8254">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8255">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8256">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8256">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8257">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8257">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8264">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8264">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8266">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8266">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8268">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8268">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8269">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8269">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8270">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8270">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8271">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8271">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8272">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8272">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8273">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8273">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8275">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8275">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8277">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8278">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8278">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8279">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8279">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8280">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8280">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8281">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8281">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8282">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8282">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8283">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8283">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8284">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8284">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8285">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8285">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8286">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8286">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8287">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8287">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8288">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8289">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8289">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8290">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8291">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8291">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8292">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8292">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8293">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8293">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8294">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8294">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8295">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8295">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8296">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8296">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8298">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8300">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8301">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8301">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8302">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8302">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8426">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8426">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8427">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8428">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8428">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8429">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8430">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8430">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8431">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8432">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8432">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8433">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8434">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8435">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8435">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8436">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8436">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8437">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8437">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8438">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8439">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8439">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8440">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8440">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8441">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8441">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8442">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8442">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8443">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8443">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8444">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8444">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8445">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8445">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8446">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8446">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8447">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8447">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8448">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8448">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8449">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8450">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8450">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8451">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8451">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8452">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8452">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8453">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8453">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8454">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8454">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8455">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8456">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8456">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8457">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8458">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8459">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8459">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8460">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8460">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8461">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8463">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8463">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8464">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8465">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8465">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8466">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8466">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8467">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8467">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8468">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8468">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8469">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8469">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8470">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8470">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8471">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8471">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8472">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8472">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8473">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8473">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8474">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8474">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8475">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8475">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8476">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8476">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8477">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8477">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8479">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8479">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8480">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8481">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8481">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8482">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8483">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8483">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8484">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8485">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8485">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8486">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8486">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8487">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8487">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8488">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8489">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8490">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8490">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8491">器 paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8491">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8492">Führerschein-nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8492">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8493">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8493">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8494">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8494">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8495">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8495">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8496">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8496">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8497">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8497">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8498">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8498">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8499">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8499">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8500">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8500">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8501">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8501">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8502">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8503">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8503">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8504">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8505">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8505">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8506">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8506">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8507">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8507">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8508">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8508">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8509">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8509">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8510">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8511">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8511">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8512">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8513">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8513">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8514">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8514">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8515">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8515">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8516">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8516">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8517">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8517">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8520">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8520">regon id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8522">统计 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8522">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8523">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8523">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8524">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8524">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8525">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8525">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8526">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8526">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8527">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8527">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8528">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8528">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8529">companyidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8529">companyidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8531">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8531">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8534">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8534">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8535">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8535">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8536">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8536">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8537">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8537">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8538">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8538">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8539">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8539">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8540">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8540">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8541">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8541">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8542">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8542">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8543">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8544">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8544">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8545">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8546">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8546">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8547">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8548">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8548">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8549">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8549">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8550">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8550">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8580">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8580">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8581">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8582">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8582">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8583">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8584">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8584">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8585">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8586">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8587">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8589">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8589">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8590">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8590">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
