## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8610">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8610">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8611">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8611">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8612">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8613">两个模式-两个字母后跟5-8 个包含特殊字符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8613">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8614">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8615">模式1：带有特殊字符的两个字母后跟5/6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8615">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8616">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8616">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8617">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8617">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8618">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8618">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8619">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8619">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8620">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8620">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8621">模式2：一个字母后跟6/8 个数字，带有特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8621">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8622">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8622">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8623">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8623">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8624">6或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8624">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8625">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8625">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8626">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8626">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8627">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8628">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8629">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8630">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8631">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8631">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8632">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8632">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8764">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8764">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8765">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8767">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8767">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8769">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8769">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8770">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8770">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8771">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8771">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8772">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8773">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8773">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8774">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8775">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8776">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8776">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8777">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8777">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8801">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8801">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8802">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8803">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8803">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8804">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8805">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8805">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8806">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8806">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8807">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8807">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8808">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8808">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8809">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8809">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8814">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8814">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8815">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8815">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8816">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8817">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8817">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8842">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8842">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8843">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8845">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8845">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8847">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8847">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8848">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8848">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8849">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8849">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8851">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8851">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8853">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8854">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8854">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8855">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8855">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8983">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8983">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8984">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8984">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8985">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8985">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8986">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8986">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8987">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8987">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8988">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8988">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8989">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8989">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8990">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8990">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8991">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8991">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8992">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8992">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8993">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8993">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8994">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8994">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8995">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8995">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-8996">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8996">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8997">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-8998">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8998">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-8999">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-8999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9000">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9000">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9001">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9001">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9002">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9002">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9003">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9003">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9004">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9004">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9055">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9055">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9056">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9057">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9058">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9058">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9059">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9060">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9060">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9061">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9061">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9062">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9062">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9063">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9063">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9065">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9065">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9066">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9066">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9081">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9081">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9082">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9082">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9083">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9083">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9084">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9084">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9085">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9085">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9086">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9086">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9087">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9087">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9088">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9088">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9089">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9089">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9090">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9090">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9091">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9091">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9092">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9092">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9093">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9093">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9094">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9094">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9095">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9095">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9096">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9096">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9097">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9098">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9098">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9099">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9100">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9101">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9101">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9102">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9102">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9119">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9119">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9120">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9120">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9121">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9121">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9122">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9122">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9123">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9123">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9124">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9124">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9125">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9125">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9126">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9126">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9127">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9127">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9128">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9128">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9129">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9129">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9130">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9130">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9131">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9131">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9132">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9132">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9134">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9134">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9136">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9136">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9137">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9137">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9138">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9138">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9155">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9155">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9157">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9157">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9159">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9159">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9160">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9161">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9161">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9162">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9163">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9163">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9164">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9164">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9165">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9165">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9166">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9167">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9167">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9168">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9168">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9169">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9169">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9170">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9170">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9171">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9171">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9172">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9172">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9174">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9174">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9175">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9176">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9176">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9177">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9177">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9178">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9178">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9179">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9179">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9183">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9184">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9184">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9185">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9185">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9186">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9187">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9188">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9188">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9189">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9189">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9190">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9190">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9191">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9191">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9200">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9200">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9201">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9201">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9202">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9203">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9203">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9204">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9205">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9205">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9206">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9206">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9207">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9207">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9208">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9209">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9209">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9210">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9211">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9211">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9212">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9213">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9339">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9339">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9340">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9340">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9341">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9341">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9342">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9342">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9343">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9343">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9344">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9344">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9345">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9345">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9347">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9347">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9348">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9348">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9349">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9349">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9350">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9350">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9351">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9351">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9352">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9352">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9354">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9354">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9357">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9357">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9358">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9358">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9359">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9359">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9360">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9360">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9407">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9407">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9408">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9408">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9410">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9410">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9411">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9412">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9412">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9413">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9414">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9415">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9416">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9417">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9417">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9418">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9437">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9437">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9438">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9440">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9440">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9441">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9442">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9442">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9444">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9444">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9447">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9447">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9448">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9575">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9575">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9576">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9576">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9577">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9577">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9578">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9578">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9579">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9579">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9580">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9580">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9581">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9581">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9582">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9583">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9583">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9584">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9584">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9585">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9585">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9586">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9586">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9587">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9587">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9588">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9588">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9589">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9589">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9590">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9591">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9591">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9592">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9593">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9593">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9594">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9594">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9595">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9595">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9596">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9596">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9597">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9597">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9625">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9625">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9626">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9626">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9628">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9628">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9629">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9630">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9630">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9631">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9631">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9632">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9632">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9633">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9633">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9634">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9635">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9635">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9636">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9637">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9637">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9638">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9638">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9639">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9659">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9659">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9660">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9660">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9661">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9661">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9662">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9662">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9663">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9663">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9664">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9664">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9665">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9665">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9666">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9667">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9667">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9668">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9668">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9669">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9669">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9670">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9670">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9671">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9671">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9672">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9673">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9674">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9675">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9676">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9676">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9677">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9677">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9678">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9678">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9679">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9679">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9703">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9703">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9705">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9705">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9707">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9707">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9708">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9708">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9709">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9709">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9710">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9710">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9711">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9711">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9712">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9712">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9714">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9716">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9717">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9717">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9718">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9718">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9719">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9719">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9720">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9720">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9721">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9721">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9724">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9724">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9725">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9725">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9727">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9727">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9728">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9729">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9729">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9730">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9730">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9731">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9731">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9732">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9732">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9733">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9733">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9734">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9734">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9735">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9735">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9737">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9737">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9740">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9740">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9741">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9741">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9742">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9744">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9744">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9745">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9745">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9746">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9746">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9747">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9747">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9748">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9748">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9749">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9749">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9750">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9750">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9751">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9751">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9752">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9752">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9753">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9753">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9754">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9754">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9756">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9756">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9758">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9758">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9759">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9759">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9760">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9760">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9762">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9764">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9765">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9765">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9766">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9767">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9767">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9768">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9768">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9902">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9902">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9903">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9904">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9905">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9906">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9907">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9908">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9910">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9910">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9912">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9912">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9913">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9913">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9914">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9914">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9915">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9915">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9917">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9917">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9919">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9920">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9920">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9921">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9921">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9922">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9923">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9923">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
