## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9947">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9947">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9948">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9948">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9949">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9949">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9950">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9950">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9951">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9951">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9952">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9952">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9953">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9953">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9954">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9954">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9955">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9955">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9956">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9957">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9957">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9958">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9959">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9959">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9960">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9960">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9961">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9961">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9987"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9987">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9988">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9988">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9989">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9990">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9990">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9991">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9991">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9992">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9992">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9993">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9993">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9994">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9994">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9995">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9995">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9996">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9996">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-9997">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9997">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-9998">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9998">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-9999">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-9999">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10000">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10000">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10001">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10001">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10002">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10002">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10003">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10003">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10004">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10004">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10005">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10005">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10006">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10006">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10007">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10008">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10009">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10010">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10011">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10012">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10014">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10014">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10016">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10016">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10017">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10017">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10018">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10018">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10019">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10019">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10020">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10020">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10021">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10021">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10022">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10022">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10023">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10023">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10024">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10024">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10025">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10025">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10026">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10026">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10027">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10027">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10028">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10028">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10029">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10029">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10030">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10030">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10031">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10031">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10032">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10032">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10033">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10033">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10034">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10034">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10035">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10036">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10036">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10037">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10038">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10039">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10039">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10040">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10040">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10041">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10041">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10042">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10042">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10073">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10073">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10074">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10074">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10075">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10075">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10076">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10076">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10077">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10077">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10078">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10078">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10079">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10079">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10080">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10080">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10081">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10081">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10082">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10082">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10083">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10083">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10084">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10084">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10085">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10085">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10086">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10086">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10087">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10087">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10088">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10088">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10089">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10089">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10090">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10090">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10091">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10091">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10092">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10092">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10093">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10093">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10094">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10094">some-password</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10119">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10119">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10120">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10120">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10122">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10122">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10123">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10124">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10124">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10125">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10125">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10126">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10126">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10127">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10127">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10128">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10129">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10129">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10130">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10131">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10132">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10132">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10133">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10133">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10266">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10266">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10268">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10268">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10270">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10270">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10271">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10271">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10272">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10272">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10273">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10273">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10274">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10274">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10276">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10278">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10278">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10279">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10279">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10280">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10280">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10281">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10282">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10282">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10283">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10283">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10284">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10284">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10303">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10303">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10304">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10304">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10305">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10306">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10306">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10307">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10308">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10308">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10309">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10310">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10310">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10311">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10312">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10313">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10313">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10314">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10314">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10315">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10315">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10316">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10316">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10347">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10347">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10348">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10348">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10350">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10350">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10352">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10352">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10353">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10353">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10354">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10354">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10355">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10355">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10356">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10356">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10357">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10357">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10358">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10359">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10359">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10360">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10361">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10361">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10362">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10362">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10363">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10363">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10364">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10365">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10365">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10381">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10381">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10382">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10383">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10384">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10385">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10386">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10387">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10388">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10389">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10389">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10391">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10391">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10392">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10392">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10393">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10393">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10394">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10394">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10395">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10395">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10396">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10396">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10397">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10397">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10398">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10398">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10399">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10399">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10400">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10400">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10401">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10402">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10402">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10403">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10403">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10404">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10405">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10405">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10431">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10431">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10433">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10433">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10434">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10435">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10435">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10436">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10436">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10437">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10437">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10438">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10438">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10439">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10439">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10440">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10440">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10442">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10445">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10445">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10446">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10446">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10483">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10483">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10484">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10484">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10485">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10485">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10486">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10486">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10487">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10487">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10488">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10488">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10489">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10489">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10491">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10491">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10492">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10493">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10493">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10494">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10494">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10495">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10495">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10496">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10496">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10497">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10497">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10498">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10498">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10499">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10499">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10500">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10500">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10501">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10502">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10503">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10504">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10505">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10505">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10506">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10506">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10507">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10507">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10508">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10508">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10522">avs 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10522">avs number</span></span>

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10528">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10529">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10529">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10531">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10531">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10533">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10533">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10534">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10534">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10535">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10535">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10536">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10536">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10538">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10538">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10541">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10541">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10542">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10542">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10543">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10545">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10545">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10546">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10546">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10547">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10547">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10548">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10548">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10563">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10563">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10564">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10564">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10565">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10565">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10566">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10566">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10567">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10568">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10568">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10569">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10569">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10570">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10570">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10571">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10571">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10572">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10572">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10573">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10574">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10574">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10575">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10576">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10577">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10577">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10578">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10578">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10579">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10579">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10580">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10580">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10581">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10581">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10582">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10582">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10583">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10583">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10584">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10584">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10585">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10585">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10586">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10586">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10587">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10587">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10588">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10588">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10589">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10589">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10590">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10590">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10591">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10591">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10592">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10592">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10593">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10593">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10594">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10594">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10595">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10595">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10596">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10597">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10597">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10598">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10599">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10600">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10600">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10601">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10601">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10602">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10602">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10603">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10603">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10604">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10604">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10605">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10605">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10606">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10606">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10607">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10607">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10608">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10608">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10609">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10609">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10610">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10610">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10611">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10611">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10612">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10612">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10613">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10613">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10614">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10614">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10615">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10615">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10617">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10617">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10618">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10619">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10619">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10620">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10620">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10621">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10621">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10622">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10623">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10624">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10625">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10625">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10626">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10626">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10627">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10627">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10628">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10629">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10629">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10630">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10630">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10631">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10631">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10632">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10632">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10633">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10633">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10634">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10634">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10635">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10635">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10636">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10636">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10637">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10637">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10638">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10638">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10640">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10642">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10642">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10643">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10644">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10644">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10645">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10647">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10647">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10648">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10648">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10650">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10650">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10651">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10651">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10652">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10652">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10653">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10653">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10654">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10654">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10657">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10657">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10658">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10658">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10659">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10659">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10661">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10661">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10663">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10663">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10664">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10664">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10665">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10665">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10666">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10666">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10667">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10667">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10668">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10668">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10670">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10670">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10672">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10673">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10673">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10674">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10674">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10675">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10685">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10685">motorcycles</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10691">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10691">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10693">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10693">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10694">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10694">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10696">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10696">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10698">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10698">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10699">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10700">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10700">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10701">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10702">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10702">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10703">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10703">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10704">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10704">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10711">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10711">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10712">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10712">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10713">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10714">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10714">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10715">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10716">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10716">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10717">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10717">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10718">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10718">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10719">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10719">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10720">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10720">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10721">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10721">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10723">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10723">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10726">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10726">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10727">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10727">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10728">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10728">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10729">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10729">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10730">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10730">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10731">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10731">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10732">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10732">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10733">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10733">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>
