#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10743">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10743">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10744">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10744">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10745">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10745">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10746">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10746">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10747">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10747">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10748">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10748">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10749">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10749">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10750">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10750">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10751">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10751">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10752">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10753">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10753">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10754">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10755">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10755">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10756"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10756">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10757">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10757">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10758">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10758">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10759">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10759">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10760">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10760">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10761">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10761">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10762">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10762">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10763">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10763">a space or dash</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10770">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10770">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10771">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10772">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10772">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10773">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10773">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10774">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10774">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10775">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10776">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10776">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10798">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10798">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10799">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10799">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10800">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10800">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10801">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10801">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10802">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10802">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10803">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10803">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10804">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10804">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10805">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10805">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10807">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10807">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10809">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10809">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10811">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10811">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10814">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10814">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10815">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10815">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10835">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10835">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10836">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10836">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10837">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10837">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10838">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10838">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10839">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10839">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10840">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10841">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10842">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10843">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10843">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10844">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10844">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10845">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10845">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10875">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10875">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10877">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10877">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10878">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10879">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10879">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10880">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10880">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10881">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10881">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10883">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10886">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10886">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10887">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10887">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10888">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10888">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10889">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10889">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10890">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10890">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10891">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10891">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10892">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10892">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10893">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10893">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10991">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10991">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10992">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10993">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10993">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-10994">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-10995">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10995">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10996">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10996">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10997">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10997">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10998">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10998">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-10999">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-10999">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11000">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11000">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11001">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11001">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11002">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11002">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11003">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11003">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11004">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11004">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11005">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11005">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11006">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11006">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11007">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11007">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11011">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11012">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11012">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11013">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11013">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11014">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11014">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11015">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11015">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11016">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11016">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11017">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11017">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11018">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11019">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11019">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11020">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11020">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11021">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11021">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11022">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11022">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11023">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11023">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11038">许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11038">License</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11044"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11044">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11045">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11046">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11046">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11047">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11047">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11048">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11049">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11049">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11050">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11050">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11051">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11051">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11052">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11052">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11053">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11053">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11054">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11054">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11055">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11055">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11056">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11056">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11057">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11058">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11058">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11059">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11059">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11060">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11060">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11061">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11061">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11062">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11062">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11063">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11063">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11064">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11064">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11065">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11065">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11066">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11066">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11067">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11067">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11068">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11068">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11069">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11069">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11070">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11070">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11073">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11073">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11074">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11074">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11075">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11075">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11076">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11076">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11077">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11077">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11078">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11078">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11079">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11079">SSNS</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11083">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11083">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11084">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11084">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11085">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11085">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11086">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11086">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11087">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11088">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11088">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11089">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11090">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11090">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11091">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11092">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11092">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11093">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11094">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11095">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11095">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11096">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11096">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11097">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11097">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11098">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11098">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11099">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11099">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11100">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11100">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11101">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11101">Passport #</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11117">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11117">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11118">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11118">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11119">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11119">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11120">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11120">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11121">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11121">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11122">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11122">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11123">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11123">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11124">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11125">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11125">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11126">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11127">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11127">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11128">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11129">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11129">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11130">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11131">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11131">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11132">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11132">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11133">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11133">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11136">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11136">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11137">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11137">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11142">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11142">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11143">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11143">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11144">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11144">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11145">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11145">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11146">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11146">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11147">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11147">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11148">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11148">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11149">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11150">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11150">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11151">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11152">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11152">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11153">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11153">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11154">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11154">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11155">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11155">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11156">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11156">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="05a65-11157">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11157">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="05a65-11158">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11159">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11159">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="05a65-11160">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="05a65-11160">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
